forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. Southwest wind 5 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 77, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In the quiet hours of the night, San Francisco offers a serene view, cloaked in a gentle veil of clouds that grant the city an ethereal calm. As the slightest breath of wind stirs the air, the temperature lingers around a comfortable 59 degrees, hinting at the pleasant day that lies ahead. As dawn breaks, the promise of sunshine unfurls—today will transform the muted gray into lively hues of warmth. With a high near 77, it whispers of afternoon delights, though a touch of coolness will linger near downtown.

This morning's forecast casts aside the fog that often blankets the bay, revealing instead a crisp clarity that invites invigorating adventures. A light wind from the southwest dances across the landscape, offering just enough chill to make a light sweater a suitable companion for those venturing out. As the hours progress, the day beckons one to stroll along the Embarcadero or indulge in the simple joys of outdoor cafes, where the warmth of the sun pairs effortlessly with a good book or the laughter of friends over coffee. The subdued glow of the early sun will lend itself to artistic wanderings, maybe even a visit to one of the many galleries, where inspiration thrives against the backdrop of such splendid weather.
